MVBC now accepts snapscan payments

We are pleased to announce that we now accept snapscan payments.

With this great facility, you can now make any sort of payment to the club without the hassle of setting up beneficiaries and logging onto your internet banking from your desktop.

Simply download the app to your phone, snap the above barcode, and make a payment.

Easy, secure and effortless.
